item.title: States of Data
item.description: States of data: At Rest: Data that is not consumed at the time is ingested. It is stored and then consumed later in a batch process. In Transit: Data that is travelling between point A and point B. In Use: Data that is opened for treatment Encountered several concerns regarding how such data must be handled. Follows a link to be reviewed later:three-states-of-data
